DOC.brief_summary: This long-term follow-up banking protocol collect medical information tissue ( blood , liver lung ) sample future research ; use data sample research purpose overseen Tissue Bank Advisory Committee ; purpose Bank research alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency .
DOC.detailed_description: Subject participation include completion inform consent , medical questionnaire , email authorization . Subjects may provide blood sample alpha-1 antitrypsin genotype , phenotype level . Lung liver tissue may also provide available . Subjects may contact often annually updated information . This project certificate confidentiality NIH .
DOC.criteria: interested individual may enroll exclusion criterion
